ygData.subject: Level 24 Pet, and related questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi folks, I m a sliver from level 24 and have a couple of questions about the new spell circle. First off, what level of pet is it possible to summon with the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi folks,

I'm a sliver from level 24 and have a couple of questions about the new
spell circle.

First off, what level of pet is it possible to summon with the level 24 pet
spell (Haunting Corpse). Reason I ask is this: last night I'm camping
Ratraz in Neriak. I summon my top pet, which hits for a max of 22. My
friend dings into level 24 and summons his new, sexy :), dark-boned
skeleton. It conned a higher blue to me than my top pet......but it never
hit for more than 22! What gives? Did he just happen to summon a sucky
one?

Next question, deals with weapons for pets. I know that recently our pets
were nerfed in this department. I know we have to give our level 29 pets 2
weapons in order to duel wield. What type of weapons do you recommend?
And, should I NOT give my level 24 pet a weapon?

Thanks in advance,
Mujahid 23 Necro Sol Ro
